name: Axie Mystical Adventure
description:
A, W, S to move.

J, K to use skills.

L to transform

This game is made for the Axie Game Hackathon 2022. (Made it to the top 10)

The team includes me & Dat. Both are programmers. 

This game is pretty much an extension of the previous Sticky Slime game but with skills, buffs, and enemies.

Future changes:

- Add tutorial levels

- Control changes (there are some complaints about the buttons currently)

- Timer and high scoreboard

- Easy, Normal, and Hard modes

- NPCs

- Web build
